name: Zawy
cooked: I had mentioned my preference for sum(work in window) / (window duration) over a given time window. It’s good, interesting, and useful to know it’s correct even for difficulty and hashrate changes. Maybe an update to getnetworkhashps could include it (by choosing a time range in addition a block range) as an option.
